content:
In Zaporozhye, the Russian rocket stroke is the dead and previously eight wounded, destroyed and damaged infrastructure, private homes and high -rise buildings.

About thisreportedHead of Zaporizhzhya Ova Ivan Fedorov.

In a few hours the enemy released almost 20 rockets across Zaporozhye. He aimed at critical infrastructure. It was exclusively into civilian objects.

“It is already known about one dead and eight wounded. Infrastructure facilities have been destroyed and damaged, automobile traffic on the hydroelectric dam was blocked, ”Ivan Fedorov said.

Ten private homes and more than 35 high -rise buildings have also been mutilated.

As reported by the Armyinform, Russia todayShe hitOn hydraulic structures and dams on Dniproges in Zaporozhye, but there is no threat of breakthrough of the dam.

The air defense forces destroyed 92 air targets during a massive attack of the Russian Federation in Ukraine.
title: In Zaporozhye as a result of rocket attack of the Russian Federation is the dead and 8 wounded
